questions.question: In shear test conducted for mild steel rod( M.S.R), mild steel plate( M.S.P) and timber( T), which is the correct order of shear strength obtained

answers.a: M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear > Timber in single shear
answers.b: Timber in single shear > M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear
answers.c: M.S.P in double shear > M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear
answers.d: M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear > M.S.P in double shear

questions.question: For two equal uniformly loaded spans, the interior reaction is _____the shear at that location.
Principle plane is a plane on which the shear stress is
Shear stress is maximum at the neutral axis. ( Say true or false)
